jump_scares.spoiler: A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
The original Em suddenly appears crawling in the hallway
The headlights of Ward’s car come on
Theresa screams “Look out!” and there is a cut to a mutilated looking G-Spot (the name of the cat) shrieking on the road
Lavinia is pulled backwards by Nathan
After calling out Lavinia’s name, there is a sudden cut to Theresa crawling towards her
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
There is a loud explosion followed by another about 15 seconds later
A gunshot may startle some viewers
There is an explosion and sparks fly from up ahead in the tunnel
Holly screams loudly
There are several more explosions and sparks fly once more
There is an explosion and more sparks as Holly runs through the tunnel
One of the creatures appears in front of the camera
Two creatures appear behind Holly
A creature appears in front of Holly as she approaches J.P
Another creature appears as Holly opens a door
A door opens from behind Dr. William Weir
Weir is grabbed on his shoulder from behind
Miller is startled by a floating hand that appears from behind
A disfigured face pops out from behind one of the crew members as she investigates a stuck CD
The lights flicker then Weir sees a person appear next to him
Lights explode around one of the crew members
Something bangs heavily on the door
Flashing images occur as Miller puts his head against the wall
Peters falls down a hole in the ground
D.J. gets attacked after spinning around
One of the crew member’s helmets is opened dramatically
A distressed woman appears on screen
Bright lights flash accompanied by loud sound effects
The telephone booth crashes down behind the shop attendant
April walks backwards into a masked man holding an axe
The lights turn off suddenly
The fuse box sparks
Loud banging can be heard from upstairs
A flash of lightning illuminates an alien outside walking towards the house
Lex is suddenly lifted into the alien ship
On some camera footage, a girl is suddenly abducted into the alien ship
A woman bursts out of a closet
Travis grabs Seth and puts a knife to his neck
An alien silhouette appears behind Travis
Travis, who is hiding underneath a bed, sees some alien feet
An alien hand grabs Travis around the face
A bang can be heard from the other side of the door
April looks through the peep hole in the door and sees an alien eye
A loud noise startles the sheriff
An alien runs quickly past the sheriff
The sheriff turns the car lights on to reveal an alien standing in front of the car
April appears by the car window beside Seth
There is a loud noise and a red light illuminates the room
After a momentary silence there is a loud noise and flashing blue lights
The floor boards begin to break up
Seth is attacked by an alien
Kyle approaches a mirror, suddenly an alien hand bursts through and grabs him
Something sparks near April
The power suddenly comes back on
The probe device suddenly opens
The alien/human hybrid opens its eyes
Fred opens the car trunk and the man inside jumps out and grabs him
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
The Engineer’s head explodes
Accompanied by a sound effect, something falls off one of the dead creatures that Filfield and Milburn are examining
Meredith is startled by Janek playing a note on his accordion
The snake-like creature latches onto Milburn’s hand
One of the snake-like creatures shoots out of Milburn’s mouth
Dr. Shaw suddenly jumps off the operating table
One of the giant alien’s arms appears in front of the door that Dr. Shaw is looking through
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
As Aubrey closes the door a man runs up to it and pounds on the window pane
Aubrey closes her eyes and the screen cuts to black. A second later, the screen suddenly cuts back in to show the creature standing right above her
As Aubrey begins to doze off there is suddenly a loud flash of a woman undressing
The lights go out, and a few seconds later a red light comes on to reveal a creature standing right in front of Aubrey
While jogging, Tatyana suddenly runs into an inmate
Tatyana places her hand on the window, and the alien suddenly lunges at the glass
While reaching out to the alien, Tatyana suddenly slips on the goo on the floor and falls
As the crew explore the Icarus I, something dislodges from the ship and makes a loud bang
Icarus II abruptly disengages from Icarus I
Pinbacker suddenly attacks Capa
Pinbacker impales Corazon with a scalpel
An abrupt cut to Mace crying out as he climbs out of the coolant reservoir may startle some viewers
Pinbacker grunts loudly and punches through a glass wall

movies.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

jump_scares.spoiler: The sound of a door opening may startle some viewers
A child suddenly lunges at the Sergeant
An infected child attacks Kieran
When Cecilia flees the house, she runs into a dog bowl after she came out of the room with the suits. Although the bowl is visible, the loud bang is very shocking
After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man
The invisible man suddenly appears beside Cecilia under the trunk
The sudden appearance of a moth-like figure on the road causes Mary to swerve and crash the car
Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A dog leaps out at Clark
Something moves past a doorway in front of Fuchs
Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind
Copper attempts to defibrillate Norris when a giant hole opens in Norris’s chest. [Video]
Palmer’s blood has a violent reaction when MacReady tests it with the copper wire
Blair appears behind Garry
The ground begins to erupt in front of MacReady
As Norah points her flashlight in front of her, the camera scrolls to reveal a dead body right in her face
While Smith and Paul investigate the back of a dead body, something suddenly jumps out from inside the body right at the camera
Emily pokes the creature, which causes it to suddenly get up and shriek
During a quiet scene, something hits the outside of the building, making a loud noise
Paul puts his ear on a wall, followed by a loud noise that startles him
There is another banging sound that startles the crew
Something hits the outside of the building again
As the crew point a flashlight to a window in the ceiling, a bunch of tentacles suddenly smash against it
Norah points her lights in front of her, which reveals a creature who swims at the camera
One of the creatures swims right in front of Norah
One of the creatures suddenly appears behind Norah as the captain shines his light on her
As the captain looks in front of him, one of the creatures swims towards the camera
Norah shines the light on a creature that suddenly attempts to grab her
The leg of one the creatures drops down in front of Norah
Norah is suddenly grabbed in the face by one of the creatures and dragged upwards
A daydreaming Emma is interrupted by Gracie who appears in front of her
Gracie coughs blood onto a boy
A helicopter flies overhead startling Emma
Emma looks through the letterbox flap and sees a figure move past the front door
During a tense scene Stacey’s boyfriend jumps out at Emma (as a joke)
Emma watches through a hole in the wall as a girl is attacked by an infected person
The infected boy appears in front of the peephole
A loud bang startles Stacey and Emma
Bright lights appear in front of Emma and Stacey as they drive down a dark road
Emma looks through the peephole on the front door and sees Evan’s father (who is now infected)
A figure moves past the window
There is a loud bang from outside the house
Evan’s father bursts through a window
There is a gunshot (followed by another approximately 15 seconds later)
Stacey grabs CJ and pulls him towards the opening in the wall
Stacey’s hand reaches out to grab the plate of food
Stacey wakes up as Emma attempts to pull the worm out
Evan shines the torch into a room full of infected people
An infected person lunges at Emma and Evan as they are running away
An infected person punches a hole through the door
